name: ShareMe Simple Social Share Plugin
author: Shipon Karmakar

sections.installation:
1. Log in to your WordPress admin dashboard.
  2. Navigate to “Plugins” â†’ “Add New.”
  3. Search for “Share Me” in the WordPress Plugin Repository.
  4. Click the “Install Now” button for the Share Me plugin.
  5. After installation, click the “Activate” button.This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Important: You need to have installed and activated ShareMe
  2. Install the plugin via WordPress or download and upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. You can see the ‘ShareMe’ Share option on your every blog posts
sections.faq:
ShortCode

You can use this Shortcode [show_shareme_social_buttons]

How to get support?

You will get support from hello@shiponkarmakar.com

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any WordPress theme.

Why Good ShareME Social Sharing Plugin?

ShareME not use any complicated option or code so you you can use ShareMe plugin without performance loss.

sections.description:
Share Me – ShareMe Simple Social Share Plugin

Share Me is a hassle-free WordPress plugin that instantly adds social sharing functionality to your blog posts. With a straightforward installation process, this plugin automatically displays social sharing buttons at the end of each of your blog articles. Give your readers the power to easily share your content across their favorite social media platforms, expanding the reach of your blog with minimal effort.

Features

  • Automated Social Sharing: Share Me takes care of the sharing process for you. After installing the plugin, social sharing buttons will automatically appear at the conclusion of your blog posts, encouraging readers to spread the word.

  • Boost Engagement: Enable your readers to share your valuable content with just a click. This increases engagement, exposes your blog to wider audiences, and helps you build a loyal readership.

  • Simplicity: Share Me is designed with simplicity in mind. There’s no need to configure complex settings or tinker with code. Install the plugin, and it seamlessly integrates into your blog’s layout.

Get Started

Elevate your blog by allowing readers to effortlessly share your content with Share Me. Once installed, this plugin automatically adds social sharing buttons to the end of your blog posts. No configuration required. Just install, activate, and watch your content spread across social media platforms.

Share Me – making sharing simple.

For any inquiries or support, reach out to us at hello@shiponkarmakar.com

Tags: ## Tags

  • Share, Social, Social Share, WordPress ,Blog Share, email, facebook, linkedin, Pinterest, shareme, whatsapp, social networks, social share, twitter, woocommerce, wordpress
